title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.64 - Control (or controlling) account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.64 - Control (or controlling) account

State Regulations

An account containing primarily totals of one or more
types of transactions, the detail of which appears in a subsidiary ledger or
its equivalent. Its balance equals the sum of the balances of the detail
accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.64

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
